mapper.insert: insert into KRjobseeker values( #{jbskId}, #{jbskPasswd}, sysdate , #{jbskName}, #{jbskGender}, #{jbskBd}, #{jbskAdd1}, #{jbskAdd2}, #{jbskAdd3}, #{jbskEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jbskTel}, #{jbskPic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jbskinfotype})
mapper.select: select count(*) from KRjobseeker where jbskId=#{jbskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from KRjobseeker where jbskId=#{jbskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from KRjobseeker where jbskId=#{jbskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update KRjobseeker set jbskPasswd='${jbskPasswd}', jbskTel='${jbskTel}' where jbskId='${jbskId}'
